title: Berkshire Hathaway Builds Stake in Refiner Phillips 66 - WSJ
text:
Billionaire investor Warren Buffettâ€™s company has amassed a stake worth nearly $4.5 billion in Phillips 66 more than a year after trading a chunk of its holding in the oil refiner for a chemical business investment.
